txt_en: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
txt_cn: 从今天起，改变生活；立即行动，拒绝拖延，别把希望押在未来。
author: Simone de Beauvoir

txt_en: Success is connecting with the world and making people feel.
txt_cn: 成功就是与世界为伴，并感染周围的人。
author: 《名扬四海》

txt_en: Keep integrity at every cost.
txt_cn: 要正直，不惜一切代价。
author: Nas, "Bridging The Gap"

txt_en: There are no great limits to growth because there are no limits of human intelligence, imagination, and wonder.
txt_cn: 成长的路途，没有尽头，因为我们拥有无限的智慧、想象力和好奇心。
author: Ronald Reagan

txt_en: Through love comes calm, and through calm comes thought.
txt_cn: 爱使人内心宁静，而后才会有思考。
author: 《三块广告牌》

txt_en: And if there's love in this life, there's no obstacle. That can't be defeated.
txt_cn: 如果生活充满爱，世界将不再有阻碍，爱可以战胜一切。
author: Avicii, "Waiting For Love"

txt_en: Fortune sides with him who dares.
txt_cn: 好运垂青有胆识的人。
author: Virgil

txt_en: The only reward of virtue is virtue; the only way to have a friend is to be one.
txt_cn: 对美德的回报是美德，获得友谊的唯一途径是给人以友谊。
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

txt_en: I'm sure we'll meet in the spring. And catch up on everything.
txt_cn: 我们一定会在春天相见，好好聊个天。
author: Troye Sivan, "The Good Side"

txt_en: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
txt_cn: 永远不要因为害怕被淘汰而不去争取。
author: Babe Ruth

txt_en: The truth is, I'm in love and there's nothing I can do about it.
txt_cn: 事实是，爱情来的时候，挡也挡不住。
author: 《真爱至上》

txt_en: Make improvements, not excuses. Seek respect, not attention.
txt_cn: 要追求进步，而不是一味地寻找借口，要寻求尊重，而不是一味地博取关注。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: The goal isn't to live forever; the goal is to create something that will.
txt_cn: 人生的目标不是要获得永生，而是要创造永恒。
author: Chuck Palahniuk

txt_en: The noblest art is that of making others happy.
txt_cn: 最高贵的艺术是使人快乐的艺术。
author: 《马戏之王》

txt_en: We are what we repeatedly do; excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
txt_cn: 每天反复做的事情造就了我们，然后你会发现，优秀不是一种行为，而是一种习惯。
author: Aristotle

txt_en: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
txt_cn: 光站在那里盯着海面，是没法穿越海洋的。
author: 泰戈尔

txt_en: All human wisdom is summed up in these two words: wait and hope.
txt_cn: 人类所有的智慧可以归结为两个词：等待和希望。
author: Alexandre Dumas

txt_en: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you've imagined.
txt_cn: 自信地往梦想的方向前进吧；去过你所设想的生活。
author: Henry David Thoreau

txt_en: Lose an hour in the morning, and you will spend all day looking for it.
txt_cn: 早上浪费一小时，得用一天的时间来弥补。
author: Richard Whately

txt_en: Putting off an easy thing makes it hard, and putting off a hard one makes it impossible.
txt_cn: 简单的事，越拖越难，困难的事，越拖越不可能做。
author: George Horace Lorimer

txt_en: Kindness is always fashionable, and always welcome.
txt_cn: 善良，永不过时，也永远为人所喜闻乐见。
author: Amelia Barr

txt_en: Happiness is not a station you arrive at, but a manner of traveling.
txt_cn: 幸福并不是你所抵达的站点，而是一种旅行的方式。
author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

txt_en: He who would travel happily must travel light.
txt_cn: 想要快乐旅行的人必须轻装上阵。
author: 安托万·德·圣埃克苏佩里

txt_en: When a thing is done, it's done. Don't look back. Look forward to your next objective.
txt_cn: 事情做完了就是做完了。别回头，继续去寻找下一个目标吧！
author: George C. Marshall

txt_en: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
txt_cn: 要想变得无可替代，就必须与众不同。
author: 可可·香奈儿

txt_en: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
txt_cn: 自信地朝你的梦想前进吧！去过你想要过的生活。
author: 亨利·戴维·梭罗

txt_en: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
txt_cn: 当一件事情足够重要时，即便缺乏胜算，你也会去做。
author: 伊隆·马斯克

txt_en: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
txt_cn: 知识会说话，但智慧是会倾听。
author: Jimi Hendrix

txt_en: One doesn't discover new lands without consenting to lose sight of the shore for a very long time.
txt_cn: 不愿在看不见海岸线的情况下久久漂流，是不会发现新大陆的。
author: 安德烈·纪德
